Address.Address1: E5 Karayolu Uzeri 209, Ust Kaynarca, Pendik

Description.Text: Divan Istanbul Asia is one of the city's most exciting new properties, a 25-story "business class" city hotel opened in November 2009. Its 230 guestrooms and suites offer not only superior comfort but also a wide range of features designed with the business traveler in mind. Their luxury hotel in Istanbul is the largest and most business-friendly hotel on the rapidly developing Asian side of the city. Providing the easiest access to Istanbul Sabiha Gokcen International Airport of any hotel in the city, their business hotel in Istanbul also is in close proximity to major corporate headquarters, organized industrial zones and other key business locations. Along with superior high-technology accommodations, the Divan Istanbul Asia provides two a la carte restaurants, three bars and nine meeting rooms, including an 765 square meter column-free ballroom for 1,000, plus a luxurious Spa & Fitness Centre perfect for winding down after a busy day. Hotel also offers Airport transfer (extra), Baby sitting service (extra), Beauty Salon/Hairdresser (extra), Doctor on call (extra), Dry cleaning (extra), Laundry service (extra), Room service (extra) and Room service - 24 hrs (extra), Ballroom, Lobby, Reception and Secretarial services.

Divan Istanbul Asia located in Pendik, (Asian side of Istanbul), just 12 kms (7 min) from the Istanbul Sabiha Gken International Airport. The hotel is easily accessible from both the E-5 Expressway and the E-6 Trans-European Motorway (TEM).

Superior Room - Superior Room offers one queen or two twin beds with amenities like Air conditioning, Alarm clock, Bathrobe, Bathroom amenities, Cable / Satellite TV, Ceiling fan, Color TV, Disabled facilities, Hairdryer, Internet access, Jacuzzi / Whirlpool / Spa bath, Kettle, Laundry service, Non-smoking rooms, Pay TV, Pay-per-view movies, Room service, Valet service and Voicemail. Superior Room also offers 30 m2 (330 sq. ft.), Pillow menu, Ventilation and central heating and cooling system, Laptop size electronic in-room safe with charging station, Flat screen LCD television and movie channels, Full bath, including tub, Telephone in the bathroom, Complimentary tea and coffee maker and Mini bar.
Deluxe Double/Twin Room - Deluxe Double/Twin Room offers one queen or two twin beds with amenities like Air conditioning, Alarm clock, Bathrobe, Bathroom amenities, Cable / Satellite TV, Ceiling fan, Color TV, Disabled facilities, Hairdryer, Jacuzzi / Whirlpool / Spa bath, Kettle, Laundry service, Non-smoking rooms, Pay TV, Pay-per-view movies, Room service, Valet service and Voicemail. Deluxe Double/Twin Room also offers (33-41 m2 440 sq. ft.), Pillow menu, Island and Sea view, Ventilation and central heating and cooling system, Complimentary Internet access, Laptop size electronic in-room safe with charging station, Flat screen LCD television and movie channels, Full bath including tub, Telephone in the bathroom, Complimentary tea and coffee maker and Mini bar.
